title: Support bulk operations for gates, labels, and dependencies
description: Enable adding multiple items in single command: 'jit gate add ISSUE gate1 gate2 gate3', 'jit dep add FROM to1 to2 to3'. Reduces command count, improves scripting, enables atomic transactions. Verify labels already support bulk (comma-separated). Note: This is complementary to issue f5ce80bc (bulk operations on multiple issues) - this issue focuses on adding multiple items to a SINGLE issue, while f5ce80bc handles batch updates across MULTIPLE issues.
